original_text: Then shall the offering of Judah and Jerusalem be pleasant unto the Lord, as in the days of old, and as in former years.
korean_text: 그 때에 유다와 예루살렘의 봉헌물이 옛날과 고대와 같이 나 여호와께 기쁨이 되려니와

sentences.original_text: Then shall the offering of Judah and Jerusalem be pleasant unto the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 유다와 예루살렘의 제물이 여호와께 기쁘게 되리니

sentences.original_text: as in the days of old
